participant_2.background:
I finally got a new graphics card for my computer so I can play Quake at a higher resolution!
I sell insurance in Hollywood with my brother in law.
i never cook.
I like to walk around and listen to music to clear my head.
i try to find easy ways to make money.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking. I am working in finance and I love helping people. What about you?
I am doing great! I sell insurance with my brother in law in Hollywood.
That sounds like a fun job! Do you like it?
It is ok, but it can be stressful sometimes. How do you like working in finance?
I love it! I get to help people with their finances and it is very rewarding. I also get to work with a great team of people.
That sounds amazing! I am glad you enjoy your job. What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to spend time with my family and friends. I also love to help people in need. I am also a big fan of Lindsey Stirling and Fine Frenzy.
Lindsey Stirling is awesome! I love her music. I also like to walk around and listen to music to clear my head.
That sounds like a great way to relax. Do you have any favorite places to go for walks?
I like to walk around the park near my house. It is a very peaceful and relaxing place.
That sounds like a great place to go for a walk. I like to walk around the lake near my house. It is also a very peaceful place.
That sounds nice! I love the outdoors. I would love to go for a walk with you sometime.
I would love that! I am free this weekend if you would like to go.
